itemDisplayName: Deploy a Storage Account for SAP ILM Store
description: This template deploys a SAP Information Lifecycle Magagement (ILM) Store on a Microsoft Azure Storage Account. A ILM Store is a component which fulfills the requirements of SAP ILM compliant storage systems. One can store archive files and indexes in a storage media using WebDAV interface standards while making use of SAP ILM Retention Management rules. For more information about SAP ILM Store, refer to the SAP Help Portal.
summary: This template deploys a Microsoft Azure Storage Account to be used as a SAP ILM Store.
